tool_description:
Extracts data from Passport instantly and accurately.

IDfy’s India Passport OCR API extracts data from an image of a passport. It accurately auto-fills this data in the right fields for a quicker & errorless form-filling experience.
name: India Passport OCR
title: India Passport OCR

api_list.name: India Passport OCR
api_list.description:
Extracts data from Passport instantly and accurately.

IDfy’s India Passport OCR API extracts data from an image of a passport. It accurately auto-fills this data in the right fields for a quicker & errorless form-filling experience.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-passport-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_passport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-passport-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-passport-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_passport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-passport-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
